page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content: The main interests in the Havant area are sailing and ball sports.Sailing is increasingly popular,because of the expanse of accessible sea.The location of Langstone club house is on the mainroad to Hayling Island,at the foot of the roadbridge.The club has approximately 120 members,who have a racing handicap,also a new club house.A number of large companies, including,Plessey,IBM & CO-OP have sports facilities and social clubs. Many social clubs have discos,dances, bingo and many other activities at a minimum cost.Ball sports are popular in this area because people are very competitive.Outdoor ball sports such as tennis,football,cricket,golf & squash are popular because of the warm and sunny climate of Southern England.
